sentences.en: At one point in the Metaphysics, Aristotle seems to distinguish between empirical studies and deductive logic.
sentences.cn: 在《形而上学》一书中, 亚里士多德似乎已谈到了经验研究和推理逻辑的区别.

sentences.en: Choice of stabilizer in emulsion systems has always been rather empirical.
sentences.cn: 在乳液体系中,稳定剂的选择往往凭经验.

sentences.en: Empirical equations are frequently used for column designing.
sentences.cn: 通常设计柱体采用经验公式.

sentences.en: Empirical evidence for the existence of population traps is not substantial.
sentences.cn: 关于人口陷井存在的经验证据还不够充分.

sentences.en: Empirical observation says that it is rarely a problem for users.
sentences.cn: 但经验显示,这对用户来说通常不是问题.

sentences.en: Empirical results are needed in the transonic Mach regime.
sentences.cn: 在跨音速马赫数范围内需要经验结果.

sentences.en: Geometrical theorems grew out of empirical methods.
sentences.cn: 几何定理是从经验得出的.

sentences.en: In order to obtain factual information about self - fertilization, empirical measurements must be made.
sentences.cn: 为了得到关于自传花粉的确实资料, 必须采用一些已行之有效的方法.

sentences.en: It is the intent herein to indicate the accumulation of empirical data.
sentences.cn: 在这里试图指出与累积试验数据有关的问题.

sentences.en: Much of her work is speculative, based on psychoanalytic theory rather than empirical data.
sentences.cn: 她的著作中有相当一部分内容是推测性的，建立在精神分析理论之上而缺乏来自实际经验的数据。

sentences.en: The description of atmospheric dispersion phenomena remains quasi - empirical and statistical.
sentences.cn: 大气扩散现象的说明仍然是准经验性的和统计性的.

sentences.en: The empirical evidence considered here is subject to many qualifications.
sentences.cn: 此处提及的实验证据有诸多限制条件。

sentences.en: The empirical relations are quite arbitrary and sometimes inadequate.
sentences.cn: 经验的关系式完全是人为的,有时是不适当的.

sentences.en: The exclusion principle is a statement of this empirical finding.
sentences.cn: 不相容原理是这个实验发现的表述.

sentences.en: We will approach the op - amp from an empirical point of view.
sentences.cn: 我们从经验观点来介绍运算放大器.

words.tran_cn: 经验主义者；使用观察实验法的人；庸医

phrases.tran_cn: 实征取向，经验探讨；实证研究法
经验研究，实证研究；实征性研究

trans.tran_cn: 经验主义的，以经验（或实验）为依据的
trans.tran_en: based on scientific testing or practical experience, not on ideas
